sentences.english: Then when Buddha became enlightened it was 2600 years ago.

sentences.english: Right now in Asia it is already lunar June 19, Date of Guan Yin's Enlightenment.
sentences.chinese: 此刻在亞洲已經是農曆六月十九觀音的成道紀念日。
